remarks: Value of the evaluation functor at an object.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
statement:
evlf1.e $e |- E = ( C evalF D ) $.
evlf1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
evlf1.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
evlf1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
evlf1.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
evlf1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
evlf1 $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( 1st ` E ) X ) = ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) ) $.
